# lightColor

**Instance Property**

The diffuse and specular color of the light source.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var lightColor: UIColor { get set }
```

```swift
@MainActor var lightColor: NSColor { get set }
```

```swift
var lightColor: UIColor { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is white.

If you are using custom shaders, you can substitute an [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKUniform] object instead.

## Configuring the Lighting Properties

- **ambientColor**: The ambient color of the light.
- **shadowColor**: The color of any shadow cast by a sprite.
- **falloff**: The exponent for the rate of decay of the light source.
